What if.....you want to install from USB or network a heavily modified version of XP with SP3 ,updated drivers , and even some apps ??? I could not find one single easy way to create a bootable USB or network installation from an altered XP CD/DVD . 
And this is how i started this project . With this torrent you will be able to install a modified (nlite) version of XP (99% automated )  with SP3 , updated drivers and some apps from 1 Gb or biger usb storage device or from any standard Pxe / iPxe server .After you did prepared the USB or PXE/iPXE server , its one time boot in linux to prepare a ntfs bootable partition and dump there the xp install files that can be located on the USB storage or any FTP/HTTP/etc server .
This method is how back in the days I used to install win95/98 .You can even add some finall touches to the xp install files before you reboot and give control to the xp install itself.With this method you can install practically any operating system you want .It give you the user full controll , flexibility and speed over the installation process.
